pointer-events: none;");    document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].appendChild(snowcanvas);    this.canvas = snowcanvas;    this.ctx = snowcanvas.getContext("2d");    /* çª—å£å¤§å°æ”¹å˜çš„å¤„ç† */    window.onresize = function() {        snowcanvas.width = window.innerWidth;
